data.title: Iran shows off new stealth fighter jet, aviation experts mock it as fake. Iran shows new jet flying, turns out to be a toy.

Women in Paris are finally allowed to wear trousers, after a 200 year law forbidding them to do so was revoked!
99 Tibetans have self-immolated themselves protesting for independence from China.  Seems like no one has noticed.

Time Running out to Save Elephants from Ivory Trade:  The new wave of killing of elephants in Africa is in many ways far graver than the crisis of the 1970s and 80s. Firstly there are fewer elephants, and secondly the demand for ivory is far higher.
